name: Staff
notes: Basic magic weapon. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Staff of air
notes: Provides unlimited air runes. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Staff of water
notes: Provides unlimited water runes. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Staff of earth
notes: Provides unlimited earth runes. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Staff of fire
notes: Provides unlimited fire runes. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Mystic air staff
notes: Provides unlimited air runes. Upgrade to the Staff of air.

name: Mystic water staff
notes: Provides unlimited water runes. Upgrade to the Staff of water.

name: Mystic earth staff
notes: Provides unlimited earth runes. Upgrade to the Staff of earth.

name: Mystic fire staff
notes: Provides unlimited fire runes. Upgrade to the Staff of fire.

name: Ancient Staff
notes: Allows casting of Ancient Magicks spells.

name: Ibans Staff
notes: Can be upgraded to Iban's Staff (u) after completing Underground Pass quest.

name: Slayer's Staff
notes: Used to cast Magic Dart, a Slayer-specific spell.

name: Slayer's Staff (e)
notes: Enhanced version of Slayer's Staff. Used to cast Magic Dart, a Slayer-specific spell.

name: Trident of the seas
notes: A powerful magic weapon that requires charges to use. Casts its own built-in spell.

name: Trident of the swamp
notes: A powerful magic weapon that requires charges to use. Casts its own built-in spell. Applies a venom effect to the target

name: Thammaron's sceptre

special_attack.name: N/A
special_attack.description: No special attack. When charged, provides a 100% accuracy and 25% damage bonus in the Wilderness.

notes: Degradable. Requires Revenant ether to charge. Provides a damage bonus in the Wilderness.

name: Accursed sceptre

special_attack.name: Condemn
special_attack.description: Consumes 50% of special attack energy to deal up to 55 damage and temporarily reduce the target's stats.

notes: Upgraded version of Thammaron's sceptre. Degradable. Requires Revenant ether to charge. Provides a damage bonus in the Wilderness.

name: Ahrim's staff

special_attack.name: N/A
special_attack.description: No special attack, but has a chance to lower the target's Strength level.

notes: Degradable, requires repair. Obtained from Barrows.

name: Kodai wand

special_attack.name: Insatiable
special_attack.description: Has a chance to not consume runes when casting a spell.

notes: Provides a 15% magic damage bonus and unlimited water runes. Obtained from the Chambers of Xeric.

name: Master wand
notes: High-level magic weapon. Can be purchased from the Mage Training Arena.

name: Book of the dead

special_attack.name: N/A
special_attack.description: No special attack. Increases damage of Arceuus spells by 6% when charged.

notes: Provides a damage bonus to Arceuus spells when charged. Requires Damned souls to charge. Degrades on use

name: Staff of light

special_attack.name: Power of Light
special_attack.description: Consumes 50% special attack energy. Melee attacks have a 25% chance to restore 10% of special attack and has a 1/8 chance to reduce damage by 50% on the next hit

notes: Provides a 15% magic damage bonus. Has a special attack that can reduce incoming damage.

name: Staff of the dead

special_attack.name: Power of Death
special_attack.description: Consumes 50% special attack energy. Melee attacks have a 25% chance to restore 10% of special attack and has a 1/8 chance to reduce damage by 50% on the next hit. Also increases melee attack by 25%

notes: Provides a 15% magic damage bonus. Has a special attack that can reduce incoming damage. Can autocast Flames of Zamorak, Claws of Guthix, and Saradomin Strike

name: Staff of balance
notes: Reward from the Mage Training Arena. Can cast Claws of Guthix.

name: Toxic staff of the dead

special_attack.name: Power of Death
special_attack.description: Consumes 50% special attack energy. Melee attacks have a 25% chance to restore 10% of special attack and has a 1/8 chance to reduce damage by 50% on the next hit. Also increases melee attack by 25%

notes: Provides a 15% magic damage bonus. Has a special attack that can reduce incoming damage. Can autocast Flames of Zamorak, Claws of Guthix, and Saradomin Strike. Adds a venom effect to targets on attack

name: Void knight mace
notes: Provides a prayer bonus. Obtained from Pest Control minigame.

name: Beginner wand
notes: Very low-level magic weapon. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Apprentice wand
notes: Low-level magic weapon. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Wizard wand
notes: Low-level magic weapon. Can be purchased from magic shops.

name: Imbued mind wand
notes: Can be purchased from the Bounty Hunter Shop.

name: Imbued water wand
notes: Can be purchased from the Bounty Hunter Shop.

name: Imbued earth wand
notes: Can be purchased from the Bounty Hunter Shop.

name: Imbued fire wand
notes: Can be purchased from the Bounty Hunter Shop.
